text: Altererythrobacter aquaemixtae is a Gram-negative, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter aquaemixtae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Altererythrobacter aquaemixtae
